languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, во время вашего отсутствия в свите произошли некоторые изменения. Уважаемый господин Антар больше не может сопровождать вас — согласно сообщению от Адептус Арбитес, он был разжалован и стал надзирателем на Веабосе-6. Однако префект Вультур уведомила меня, что в вашей власти оспорить это решение и восстановить господина Антара в должности".

"Lord Captain, during your absence, your retinue has seen certain changes. The esteemed Master Anthar will no longer be able to accompany you. According to a message from the Adeptus Arbites, he has been discharged and is currently an overseer on Vheabos VI. However, Prefect Vultur has informed me that you have the authority to challenge that decision and have Master Anthar reinstated."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, во время вашего отсутствия в свите произошли некоторые изменения. Уважаемый господин Антар больше не может сопровождать вас — согласно сообщению от Адептус Арбитес, он был разжалован и стал надзирателем на Веабосе-6. Однако префект Вультур уведомила меня, что в вашей власти оспорить это решение и восстановить господина Антара в должности".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, while you were away, your retinue has seen certain changes. The esteemed Master Anthar will no longer be able to accompany you. According to a message from the Adeptus Arbites, he has been demoted and is currently an overseer on Vheabos-VI. However, Prefect Vultur has informed me that you have the authority to challenge that decision and have Master Anthar reinstated."

According to a message from the Adeptus Arbites, he has been demoted and is currently an overseer on Vheabos-VI. However, Prefect Vultur has informed me that you have the authority to challenge that decision and have Master Anthar reinstated."

According to a message from the Adeptus Arbites, he has been demoted and is currently an overseer on Vheabos VI. However, Prefect Vultur has informed me that you have the authority to challenge that decision and have Master Anthar reinstated."

"Lord Captain, during your absence, your retinue has seen certain changes. The esteemed Master Anthar will no longer be able to accompany you. According to a message from the Adeptus Arbites, he has been demoted and is currently an overseer on Vheabos VI. However, Prefect Vultur has informed me that you have the authority to challenge that decision and have Master Anthar reinstated."

"Lord Captain, during your absence, your retinue has seen certain changes. The esteemed Master Anthar will no longer be able to accompany you. According to a message from the Adeptus Arbites, he has been discharged and is currently an overseer on Vheabos VI. However, Prefect Vultur has informed me that you have the authority to challenge that decision and have Master Anthar reinstated."

"Lord Captain, during your absence, your retinue has seen certain changes. The esteemed Master Anthar will no longer be able to accompany you. According to a message from the Adeptus Arbites, he has been discharged and is currently an overseer on Vheabos VI. However, Prefect Vultur has informed me that you have the authority to challenge that decision and have Master Anthar reinstated."

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ご不在の間に、従者の構成にいくつかの変更がありました。尊敬すべきマスター・アンサールは、今後あなたに同行することができません。高等裁定局の報せによれば、彼は解任されました。現在はヴィアボス・VIで監督官を務めているとのことです。ただし、ヴァルター総監からの伝言によれば、あなたにはその決定に異議を唱え、マスター・アンサールを復職させる権限があるそうです」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, during your absence, your retinue has seen certain changes. The esteemed Master Anthar will no longer be able to accompany you. According to a message from the Adeptus Arbites, he has been discharged and is currently an overseer on Vheabos VI. However, Prefect Vultur has informed me that you have the authority to challenge that decision and have Master Anthar reinstated."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ご不在の間に、従者の構成にいくつかの変更がありました。尊敬すべきマスター・アンサールは、今後あなたに同行することができません。高等裁定局の報せによれば、彼は解任されました。現在はヴィアボス・VIで監督官を務めているとのことです。ただし、ヴァルター総監からの伝言によれば、あなたにはその決定に異議を唱え、マスター・アンサールを復職させる権限があるそうです」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, yokluğunuzda maiyetinizde birtakım değişiklikler oldu. Saygıdeğer Üstat Anthar artık size eşlik edemeyecek. Adeptus Arbites'ten gelen bir mesaja göre kendisi görevden alındı ve şu anda Vheabos VI'da gözetmenlik yapıyor. Ancak Prefekt Vultur, bu karara itiraz etme ve Üstat Anthar'ın görevine iadesini sağlama yetkisine sahip olduğunuzu bildirdi."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, during your absence, your retinue has seen certain changes. The esteemed Master Anthar will no longer be able to accompany you. According to a message from the Adeptus Arbites, he has been discharged and is currently an overseer on Vheabos VI. However, Prefect Vultur has informed me that you have the authority to challenge that decision and have Master Anthar reinstated."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, yokluğunuzda maiyetinizde birtakım değişiklikler oldu. Saygıdeğer Üstat Anthar artık size eşlik edemeyecek. Adeptus Arbites'ten gelen bir mesaja göre kendisi görevden alındı ve şu anda Vheabos VI'da gözetmenlik yapıyor. Ancak Prefekt Vultur, bu karara itiraz etme ve Üstat Anthar'ın görevine iadesini sağlama yetkisine sahip olduğunuzu bildirdi."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, durante su ausencia, se han producido ciertos cambios en su séquito. El estimado maestro Anthar no podrá acompañarle más. Según un mensaje del Adeptus Arbites, ha sido relevado del cargo y asignado como supervisor a Vheabos VI. Sin embargo, la prefecta Vultur me ha informado de que tiene usted autoridad suficiente para disputar la decisión y reinstaurar al maestro Anthar».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, during your absence, your retinue has seen certain changes. The esteemed Master Anthar will no longer be able to accompany you. According to a message from the Adeptus Arbites, he has been discharged and is currently an overseer on Vheabos VI. However, Prefect Vultur has informed me that you have the authority to challenge that decision and have Master Anthar reinstated."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, durante su ausencia, se han producido ciertos cambios en su séquito. El estimado maestro Anthar no podrá acompañarle más. Según un mensaje del Adeptus Arbites, ha sido relevado del cargo y asignado como supervisor a Vheabos VI. Sin embargo, la prefecta Vultur me ha informado de que tiene usted autoridad suficiente para disputar la decisión y reinstaurar al maestro Anthar».

languages.text: “舰长大人，您不在的这段时间里，您的随行人员发生了变动。尊敬的安萨大师无法继续留在您身边了。根据法务部发来的消息，他已经被免职了，目前在维博斯六号星上担任监察员一职。不过，沃尔图尔行政官告诉我，说您有权质疑这个决定，也有权恢复安萨大师的职务。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, during your absence, your retinue has seen certain changes. The esteemed Master Anthar will no longer be able to accompany you. According to a message from the Adeptus Arbites, he has been discharged and is currently an overseer on Vheabos VI. However, Prefect Vultur has informed me that you have the authority to challenge that decision and have Master Anthar reinstated."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，您不在的这段时间里，您的随行人员发生了变动。尊敬的安萨大师无法继续留在您身边了。根据法务部发来的消息，他已经被免职了，目前在维博斯六号星上担任监察员一职。不过，沃尔图尔行政官告诉我，说您有权质疑这个决定，也有权恢复安萨大师的职务。”

languages.text: « Votre entourage a connu certains changements en votre absence, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. L'honorable maître Anthar ne pourra plus vous accompagner dans vos voyages. D'après un message de l'Adeptus Arbites, il a été démis de ses fonctions et affecté au poste de surveillant sur Vhéabos-VI. Cependant, la préfète Vultur m'informe que vous êtes en droit de contester cette décision et de réintégrer le proctor au sein de votre équipage. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, during your absence, your retinue has seen certain changes. The esteemed Master Anthar will no longer be able to accompany you. According to a message from the Adeptus Arbites, he has been discharged and is currently an overseer on Vheabos VI. However, Prefect Vultur has informed me that you have the authority to challenge that decision and have Master Anthar reinstated."

traits.locale_text: « Votre entourage a connu certains changements en votre absence, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. L'honorable maître Anthar ne pourra plus vous accompagner dans vos voyages. D'après un message de l'Adeptus Arbites, il a été démis de ses fonctions et affecté au poste de surveillant sur Vhéabos-VI. Cependant, la préfète Vultur m'informe que vous êtes en droit de contester cette décision et de réintégrer le proctor au sein de votre équipage. »

languages.text: "Lord Captain, während Eurer Abwesenheit gab es in Eurem Gefolge gewisse Veränderungen. Der geschätzte Meister Anthar kann Euch nicht länger begleiten. Einer Nachricht des Adeptus Arbites zufolge wurde er abgesetzt und als Aufseher auf Vheabos-VI versetzt. Präfektin Vultur hat mich allerdings informiert, dass Ihr das Recht habt, die Entscheidung anzufechten und Meister Anthar wieder einzusetzen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, during your absence, your retinue has seen certain changes. The esteemed Master Anthar will no longer be able to accompany you. According to a message from the Adeptus Arbites, he has been discharged and is currently an overseer on Vheabos VI. However, Prefect Vultur has informed me that you have the authority to challenge that decision and have Master Anthar reinstated."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, während Eurer Abwesenheit gab es in Eurem Gefolge gewisse Veränderungen. Der geschätzte Meister Anthar kann Euch nicht länger begleiten. Einer Nachricht des Adeptus Arbites zufolge wurde er abgesetzt und als Aufseher auf Vheabos-VI versetzt. Präfektin Vultur hat mich allerdings informiert, dass Ihr das Recht habt, die Entscheidung anzufechten und Meister Anthar wieder einzusetzen."
